attributes.action: Render it necessary for the D.W.P. and its employees to inform a receiver of benefits about EVERYTHING they are entitled to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current legislation states that unless a person has asked a DWP employee about a specific benefit which the law says they are entitled to, the person will not be informed about the benefit. Those who claim benefits should be told exactly what they are entitled to.
